name: Moonfin
overview: Custom UI and settings sync for Jellyfin
description:
Moonfin brings a modern TV-style UI to Jellyfin web. Features include: custom navbar, media bar with featured content, Jellyseerr integration, and cross-device settings synchronization. Works with Android TV, Roku, Tizen, webOS, and Web clients.

Requires File Transformation plugin for automatic UI injection.

versions.changelog:
Initial release with core features: navbar, media bar, custom details screens, IMDBList integration, Jellyseerr integration, and settings sync.
 Hope you like it!
